# Tables {-}

```{r}

kable(tabb$t,
    # col.names = ,
    align     = "c",
    label     = "tab1",
    position  = "H",
    booktabs  = TRUE,
    longtable = TRUE,
    caption   = "My table caption") %>%

  add_header_above(c(" ", "Group 1" = 5, "Group 2" = 6)) %>%
  add_header_above(c(" ", "High level group" = 11), bold = T, italic = T) %>%
  kable_styling(full_width    = FALSE,
                font_size     = 10,
                latex_options = c("striped", "repeat_header"))
```
